scc_rules.description: Check whether multifactor authentication (MFA) is enabled at the account level
scc_rules.ignore_reason: The reason this fails is because the VPC module is calling the ibm_iam_account_settings data lookup, however its not setting any account settings, so hence its not applicable to this DA and should be ignored.

scc_rules.description: Check whether permissions for API key creation are limited and configured in IAM settings for the account owner
scc_rules.ignore_reason: The reason this fails is because the VPC module is calling the ibm_iam_account_settings data lookup, however its not setting any account settings, so hence its not applicable to this DA and should be ignored.

scc_rules.description: Check whether permissions for service ID creation are limited and configured in IAM settings for the account owner
scc_rules.ignore_reason: The reason this fails is because the VPC module is calling the ibm_iam_account_settings data lookup, however its not setting any account settings, so hence its not applicable to this DA and should be ignored

scc_rules.description: Check whether Cloud Object Storage is enabled with customer-managed encryption and Keep Your Own Key (KYOK)
scc_rules.ignore_reason: KMS is not supported for quickstart.
